ime_proizvoda: M20 HD Powered Wireless Music System
opis: New Q Acoustics M20 HD Bluethooth wireless music system. The powered bookshelf speakers that can be connected to your TV, game consoles, portable music players, and more. Hear the stunning wireless high-resolution stereo sound anywhere in your home.

specifikacije.Inputs:
Bluetooth® 5.0 (with aptX™, aptX™ HD, aptX™ Low Latency, SBC and AAC compatibility)
USB (24bit/192kHz compatibility)
Digital optical (24bit/192kHz compatibility)
Stereo RCA (line level)
3.5mm (line level)

opis: View Q Acoustics 3010i bookshelf speakers that boasts room-filling sound which have been revised to take advantage of a larger cabinet volume to enhance sensitivity and bass extension. Small yet mighty sound for its size!

specifikacije.Dimensions: 250 x 150 x 235 mm (9.8 x 5.9 x 9.3 in) cabinet253 x 150 x 251 mm (10 x 5.9 x 9.9 in) overall

opis: View Q Acoustics 3020i boookshelf speakers. The Q 3020i speakers deliver deep bass and room-filling sound and matches with any room decoration. 3020i speakers are available in four different colors.

specifikacije.Dimensions: 275 x 170 x 265 mm (10.8 x 6.7 x 10.4 in) cabinet278 x 170 x 281 mm (10.9 x 6.7 x 11.0 in) overall

opis: Q Acoustics 3030i bookshelf speaker is the latest addition to the Award-winning 3000i speaker range. Designed to deliver the biggest, most commanding sound ever achieved by a speaker of this type and price.

specifikacije.Dimensions: 320 x 200 x 313 mm (12.6 x 7.9 x 12.3 in) cabinet325 x 200 x 329 mm (12.8 x 7.9 x 13 in) overall

opis: View the latest addition to the Q Acoustics Concept Speaker Range, Concept 30 bookshelf speakers that deliver a superb sonic sound at this price point. Available in black, silver and white finishes to match every living room.

The idea for the Concept 300 is simple, yet staggeringly ambitious. Built on the success of the floorstanding Concept 500 and delivering a stand mounting alternative that is more affordable without compromising performance and style

Small enough to keep a low profile, but with sound big and accomplished enough to draw attention to itself. If you want off-the-scale performance from a discreet, compact and easy-to-position loudspeaker, the 5010 bookshelf speaker fits the bill as nicely as it fits your space.

Experience all the scale and power of your favourite music without letting your loudspeaker dominate your room. The 5020 standmounting speaker will put your right in the heart of the music without putting itself at the heart of your space.

A compact and discreet loudspeaker that won’t draw attention to itself - at least, not until it starts performing. If you want a small, easy-to-position speaker that sounds way bigger than it looks, this bookshelf model fits the bill (and your space) perfectly.

If you want scale in your sound but not in the size of your loudspeaker cabinet, you want the new 3020c standmount. It’s ready and able to let you experience all the power and dynamism of your favourite music, but without dominating your living space.

Sometimes you want your music to hit hard and dig deep - but that doesn’t mean you need a great big loudspeaker with a great big driver. No, it means you need the 3030c - the standmount with the greatest bass extension and low-end drive in the range.
The Q 3050i floorstanding speakers boast a range of unique technologies including HPE™ and P2P™ to ensure these floorstanding speakers deliver a truly exceptional sound.

View the latest addition to the Q Acoustics Concept Speaker Range, Concept 50 floorstanding speakers that deliver a superb sonic sound at this price point. Available in black, silver and white finishes to match every living room.

specifikacije.Dimensions (per loudspeaker / HxWxD)Inc: 1025 x 418 x 319 mm (40.4 x 16.5 x 12.6 in), Cabinet width: 180 mm (7.1 in)

opis: Designed to appeal to discerning audiophiles, the Concept 500 achieves a perfect balance between art and science. It is a loudspeaker that is at once, stylish, contemporary, fine-sounding and astonishingly accurate.

5040 is a notably compact floorstander with a modest footprint - which means it’s ideal for those environments where space is at a premium but the desire for full-scale audio excitement (as well a visual gratification) is strong.

Where sheer scale, widescreen sound-staging and complete audio-fidelity are concerned, the 5050 outperforms its nominal competition with ease. If you have a bigger space to fill with the most beautifully and accurately reproduced sound, the 5050 floorstander is the speaker you need. Supplied with magnetically fixed grilles.

The most convenient and cost-effective way to fill your home with full-size, powerful and immersive sound without filling your home with big, imposing loudspeakers. These quality micro-towers have the flexibility to support numerous wired and wireless sources of music.
The Q 3090Ci boasts twin 100mm (4”) and 22mm (0.9”) precision drivers delivering the ultimate cinematic experience.

specifikacije.Dimensions: 150 x 430 x 200 mm (5.9 x 16.9 x 7.9 in) cabinet153 x 430 x 216 mm (6 x 16.9 x 8.5 in) overall

opis: Utilizing the technology that the rest of the 3000i series boasts, the Q 3060S slimline subwoofer is as powerful as it is attractive.

specifikacije.Dimensions: 300 x 480 x 155 mm (11.8 x 18.9 x 6.1 in) cabinet324 x 480 x 155 mm (12.8 x 18.9 x 6.1 in) overall

opis: View the latest addition to the Q Acoustics Concept Speaker Range, Concept 90 center channel speaker that deliver a realistic surround sound experience. Available in black, silver and white finishes to match every living room decor.
This powerful, 140watts rms, twin 170mm drive unit subwoofer will bring the full explosive majesty of blockbuster movie soundtracks into your living room.

specifikacije.Dimensions: 400 x 200 x 525 mm (15.7 x 7.9 x 20.7 in) overall

opis: Designed to project dialogue ahead of even the most full-on Hollywood action movie soundtrack, and to deliver all the subtlety and nuance of art-house favourites with equal ease and conviction. Put the 5090 at the centre of your home cinema system and get the complete picture.

Smaller rooms with smaller speakers still deserve big, well-controlled bass for listening to music or watching movies. The Q SUB80 with its 8in driver is the ideal partner for M20 or M40 active speakers or 3000c and 5000 Cinema Packs in ones or twos.

A bigger space demands bigger bass - and that’s exactly what the Q SUB100 provides. Its 10in driver and effortless performance make it the perfect low-frequency partner for our Concept loudspeakers, as well as every other medium-sized passive speaker in our line-up.

No matter if it’s a stereo set-up or full-on surround-sound cinema system, the Q SUB120 can fill your listening room with that infra-bass Low Frequency Effect you can feel as well as hear. Big room with big speakers? No problem
All QED cables are designed using the top down principle. XT25 represents the core musical performance trickled down from our money-no-object Supremus cable in a more affordable package.
The latest QED XT40i Speaker cable range improved with X-Tube technology that outperforms the competitors' cables. Choose between 2 meter,3 meter or 5 meter speaker cable options.

ime_proizvoda: QED Silver Anniversary XT Speaker Cables
opis: Silver Anniversary-XT has been specifically designed as the natural replacement for the multi-award winning Silver Anniversary speaker cable.

ime_proizvoda: QED Golden Anniversary XT Speaker Cable
opis: QED celebrates its 50th anniversary in style, with the introduction of its Golden Anniversary XT speaker cable. Representing the culmination of five decades of dedicated and extensive research, engineering and audio expertise, Golden Anniversary XT speaker cable is the ideal upgrade for any hi-fi enthusiast who wants to experience the sonic benefits of a high-end speaker cable - but at a real-world price

specifikacije.Conductors: 9 x 19/0.13 mm OFC + 1 x 19/0.13 mm UP-OCC

opis: Feel every beat with the Performance Subwoofer cable.

QED Subwoofer 40 has been designed primarily for low capacitance, as this has been identified by QED as a major factor making for a tight sound which retains the rhythm of the original piece - vital when it comes to the 'bottom end!" Minute timing errors are improved by QED's Complementary Conductor Technology™ combined with a special floating Zn/Mn ferrite jacket to absorb very high frequency noise signals outside the audible band. The QED Analoc2™ plug design helps to control eddy currents which can also affect the micro-timing of the audio signal, maintaining high- fidelity from start to finish.
A sturdy wall bracket boasting a 'tilt and turn' mechanism, a Concept 30 or 90 speaker can be mounted almost flat to the wall or angled down or sideways. Available in black or white finishes
The FS50 floor stand is designed and sonically optimised for Q Acoustics loudspeakers boasting a classic, stable triple upright design.<

The 3030FSi floor stands are specially designed and specifically optimized for the 3030i speakers. Precision laser-cut steel construction and acoustically damped columns ensure quality and performance.

Order the Q FS75 tensegrity speaker floor stands that are compatible with the latest Q Active 200 stand mount speakers. In addition to its acoustic benefits, the stand’s minimal design is the perfect visual complement to Q Active 200’s unique looks.

opis: Q Acoustics Concept 300 Speakers’ Tensegrity Stands redefine the relationship between the speaker and the stand by using a completely new design

ime_proizvoda: Tensegrity Speaker Stand Pair with Universal Adapter Plate
opis: Q Acoustics Tensegrity Speaker Stands redefine the relationship between the speaker and the stand by using a completely new design and it is now suitable for other brands with a universal adapter plate.
